metadata.title: CVE-2023-0417 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Memory leak in the NFS dissector in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capturefile

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
